Real Madrid: 81 million euros + Gareth Bale to afford Sterling?
According to Sky Sports, Real Madrid would be ready to break his piggy bank and offer Gareth Bale to Manchester City to enlist the services of England striker Raheem Sterling.
04 Nov 2019, 13:20 by Florian Sermaise

13 goals, 5 dived passes. In all competitions, the English striker Raheem Sterling has a good start to the season with Manchester City's Pep Guardiola. The Citizen, which remains on the launch of its past season, is scrutinized closely by the European leaders. Of which Real Madrid.




Gareth Bale in currency of exchange




Gareth Bale + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to Sky Sports, the White House would prepare a substantial offer to engage the services of the former center forward of Liverpool. The British media evokes a sum of 81 million euros in addition to Gareth Bale. Also according to Sky Sports, Raheem Sterling would be a priority for the leaders of Madrid, who will visit in recent weeks scrutinize the 24-year-old with Manchester City. As a reminder, the English is under contract until 2023 at the Skyblues.
